title: JUSTICE IN A FALLEN WORLD With Jacob T. Levy
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: Can we know the nature of justice before confronting the conditions of injustice? I’m joined by Jacob T Levy to discuss his upcoming work Justice in Babylon, we cover Ideal theory, Rawls, the nature of politics and the nature of the human condition.
itunes:subtitle: Can we know the nature of justice before confront…
description: Can we know the nature of justice before confronting the conditions of injustice? I’m joined by Jacob T Levy to discuss his upcoming work Justice in Babylon, we cover Ideal theory, Rawls, the nature of politics and the nature of the human condition.
